title: Microlearning-Based Advanced Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience applying mathematics to job-related tasks
context.additional_context: Emphasizes workplace relevance for current practitioners, providing flexible learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced high school mathematics concepts needed for practical problem-solving with 80% accuracy through a microlearning module within four weeks.
Learners can submit deliverables integrating knowledge acquired from microlearning into real-world work cases via project-based assessments.
Learners evaluate their satisfaction with the microlearning approach at 4.0/5.0 or higher through a survey at the end of the course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
